column1: 'Started to work from home as a result of the situation' by country

The data show 'Yes' for respondents in the EU27 when asked:  Have you started to work from home as a result of the COVID-19 situation?  Slovenia is excluded from the data for this question because of a translation issue.
Low reliability (*):  Cyprus, Latvia, Malta, Netherlands and Sweden.
Cite as: Eurofound (2020), Living, working and COVID-19 dataset, Dublin, http://eurofound.link/covid19data
